DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine the effect of multiple oral doses of ezetimibe on the pharmacokinetics of a single oral dose cyclosporine in young healthy males and females.
DOC.criteria: Subject is male or female between 18 to 45 years of age Subject is judged to be in good health on the basis of history, physical examination, and routine laboratory data Premenopausal women who are currently pregnant or who are currently nursing Subjects with drug or substance abuse, poor mental function, history of major gastrointestinal abnormalities (stomach issues), or high cholesterol Subject that has donated blood or has participated in another clinical trial within the last four weeks
